title: Kinh doanh bất động sản 1
overview: Học phần này cung cấp những kiến thức cơ bản về kinh doanh bất động sản và quản trị kinh doanh bất động sản.

key_concepts: Human Resource Management in Real Estate Business

skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Understand the concepts, characteristics of real estate business, principles, and theories applied in real estate business
Analyze business opportunities and develop strategic plans for real estate business
Analyze and choose the appropriate enterprise type for real estate business
Research and analyze opportunities, environment for real estate business; choose enterprise type and build management structure
Research methods and operations of human resource management in real estate business
Be proactive in learning, researching, and group work
Be proactive in choosing issues, data, and presenting research results

minimum_entry_skills.skill_name: Basic Understanding of Real Estate Market
